basics.name: Dan Barrett
basics.label: Digital Developer & Systems Engineer
basics.summary: I am a hard working individual with a passion for all things web development.

work.summary: Back-end Developer responsible for WordPress sites that are fully customisable by the clients.
highlights: Converted static sites from Front-end developers to fully editable WordPress templates

work.summary: Sole Digital Developer at LivingBrand where we provide clients with wonderfully designed sites that are lightning quick.
highlights: Used Grunt for development and deployment processes
Developed client websites and internal plugins for WordPress
Developed internal software using Laravel
Supercharge websites with optimised JavaScript and CSS
Wrote client facing documentation for use with their website
Used Git in both the command-line and Tower.app

work.summary: Dan Barrett IT Contracting provides Mac and network installation, configuration and ongoing support for small to medium businesses.
highlights: Currently contracted by Crunch IT
Use of ConnectWise to manage jobs and tickets
Online, phone call and onsite support for clients
Provide technical support for clients on both OS X and Windows platforms
Perform workstation and server maintenance through Apple Remote Desktop
Assisted in internal infrastructure maintenance
Contributed to internal procedures and scripts

work.summary: Streetwise is an Authorised Apple Reseller and Apple Authorised Service Provider employing over 15 people.
highlights: Work with members of the service department to run an efficient repair workshop while maintaining a high level of repair quality, working safely, and customer satisfaction
Analyse, fault-find and repair Apple computers
Provide customer support via email, telephone and in-store
Configure, deploy, install and maintain OS X Servers in small-to-medium enterprise
Prepare customer proposals for business and small enterprise computing solutions
Perform home and onsite visits for private and business customers
Assist with maintenance and ongoing support of internal infrastructure
Managed and maintained internal infrastructure while Service Manager was on leave

work.summary: I have worked at many functions where I have been in the “back of house” position which involved the assembly of food in a precise and speedy manner then washing dishes.  I have also worked on emergency clean-ups which have required me to be at work very late at night, or very early in the morning.  In addition to the function work, I have worked at major events like the MotoGP and the Spring Racing Carnival where I have worked as a runner.  As a runner I have received many commendations from cliental and senior members of Peter Rowland Catering.
highlights: Prepared and assembled food in accordance to stringent food safety and handling procedures
Served alcoholic/non-alcoholic beverages to customers and following my responsibility as a holder of a Responsible Service of Alcohol certificate holder
Handled cash money and operated a till over several days at the 2010 Kooyong Classic
Cleaned up facilities using a number of different chemicals safely

work.summary: I worked as a member of the Grips department on the filming of “South Solitary” at Cape Nelson, Victoria.  I picked up many new skills and knowledge of how the film industry works.

During my years of service for the Reicher & Szylit Amcal Pharmacy located in Ormond, Victoria I supplied the local residents with their pharmaceutical products.  As this job required a strong knowledge of map reading, I was quite successful and fast because I planned out the quickest routes using pathfinding techniques.

highlights: Evaluated and reviewed architectural plans for residential housing
Assembled card models of houses from plans
Assisted National Security Manager testing security devices in an ASIO and Defence rated building
Set up office space and configured security phones in an ASIO and Defence rated building
Set up and managed entertainment systems for International CEO and Team CSC visit in January 2008

awards.title: IT Challenge - Web Design
awards.summary: I was awarded first prize for my blog's WordPress theme.

skills.name: Systems Administration
keywords: Configuration and deployment of LAMP stacks
